title: Enhancing e-Learning Practice Competencies: Emergency Remote Teaching-Based Nursing Genetics Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic genetics knowledge and nursing practicum experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain human diversity with over 80% accuracy using genomic information
Learners can analyze three or more genetic-based disease cases in a simulation environment and develop nursing intervention plans
Learners can demonstrate practical application of genetics knowledge by achieving 75+ points on a summative assessment in an ERT (Emergency Remote Teaching) environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
